mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.lec_code, a.lec_cl, (SELECT com_code_nm FROM tb_com_code WHERE code_grp = 'G06' AND a.lec_cl = com_code) lec_cl_nm, (CASE WHEN a.lec_cl = 01 OR a.lec_cl = 02 THEN 'G06_1' WHEN a.lec_cl = 03 OR a.lec_cl = 04 THEN 'G06_2' END) lec_cl_grp, b.lec_name, b.staff_no, d.name, b.sub_code, c.sub_name, c.col_code, (SELECT col_name FROM college WHERE c.col_code = col_code) col_name, NVL(b.lec_atnlc, 0) lec_atnlc, b.lec_pnt, a.lec_time, TO_NUMBER(a.lec_time + b.lec_pnt - 1) lec_end, (SELECT COUNT(lec_code) FROM sugang_req WHERE a.lec_code = lec_code) lec_sugang, b.lec_cpacity, a.dayotw, (SELECT SUBSTR(com_code_nm, 1, 1) FROM tb_com_code WHERE code_grp = 'G19' AND a.dayotw = com_code ) dayotw_nm, a.estbl_year, a.estbl_semstr, a.atch_file_no FROM lecture a INNER JOIN curriculum b ON (a.cur_code = b.cur_code) INNER JOIN subject c ON(b.sub_code = c.sub_code) INNER JOIN staff d ON(b.staff_no = d.staff_no) WHERE a.estbl_year >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND a.estbl_semstr = (SELECT semstr FROM v_semstr) AND a.summary IS NOT NULL )
mapper.sql: SELECT a.lec_code, c.lec_name, b.lec_cl, (SELECT com_code_nm FROM tb_com_code WHERE code_grp = 'G06' AND B.lec_cl = com_code) lec_cl_nm, c.staff_no, d.name, a.stdnt_no, a.req_dt, a.req_year, a.req_semstr, a.sugang_at, NVL(c.lec_atnlc, 0) lec_atnlc, c.lec_pnt, b.lec_time, TO_NUMBER(b.lec_time + c.lec_pnt - 1) lec_end, (SELECT COUNT(lec_code) FROM sugang_req WHERE b.lec_code = lec_code) lec_sugang, c.lec_cpacity, b.dayotw, (SELECT SUBSTR(com_code_nm, 1, 1) FROM tb_com_code WHERE code_grp = 'G19' AND b.dayotw = com_code ) dayotw_nm, e.sub_name, (SELECT col_name FROM college WHERE e.col_code = col_code) col_name FROM sugang_req a INNER JOIN lecture b ON (a.lec_code = b.lec_code) INNER JOIN curriculum c ON (b.cur_code = c.cur_code) INNER JOIN staff d ON(d.staff_no = c.staff_no) INNER JOIN subject e ON(c.sub_code = e.sub_code) WHERE a.stdnt_no = #{stdnt_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.req_year >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND a.req_semstr = (SELECT semstr FROM v_semstr)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sugang_req ( lec_code, stdnt_no, req_dt, req_year, req_semstr, sugang_at ) VALUES ( #{lec_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stdnt_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{req_year, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{req_semstr, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 'N' )

MERGE INTO sugang_req A USING( SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) COUNT FROM sugang_req WHERE sugang_at = 'N' AND stdnt_no = #{stdnt_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND lec_code = #{lec_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) B ON (B.COUNT > 0) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET sugang_at = 'Y' WHERE stdnt_no = #{stdnt_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND lec_code = #{lec_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( lec_code, stdnt_no, req_dt, req_year, req_semstr, sugang_at ) VALUES ( #{lec_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stdnt_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{req_year, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{req_semstr, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 'Y' )
